paper_abstract: We extend the concept of factorization on finite words to omega-rational languages and show how to compute them. We define a normal form for Buchi automata and introduce a universal automaton for Buchi automata in normal form. We prove that, for every omega-rational language, this Buchi automaton, based on factorization, is canonical and that it is the smallest automaton that contains the morphic image of every equivalent Buchi automaton in normal form.
paper_title: FACTORIZATIONS AND UNIVERSAL AUTOMATON OF OMEGA LANGUAGES
